import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { StaffService } from 'src/app/service/staff.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-staff', templateUrl: './staff.component.html', styleUrls: ['./staff.component.css'] }) export class StaffComponent implements OnInit{ staff: Array = []; constructor(private staffService: StaffService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.staffService.getStaff().subscribe(data => { this.staff =data; }) } }
